subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Joe Calzaghe has postponed his proposed September light-heavyweight fight against Roy Jones Jr. because of a sprained right wrist. Jones accepted the delay, saying that he wanted Calzaghe to be at his best. Calzaghe, 36, who is unbeaten in 45 professional fights during a 15-year career, injured his hand Sunday while training. Calzaghe’s trainer and father, Enzo, said his son needed two or three weeks off before he started punching again.
